00002 // Standard includes
00003 #include <System/Thread.h>
00004
00005 namespace Omiscid {
00006
00007 class TimeoutProg : public Thread
00008 {
00009 public:
00010     TimeoutProg(int TimeInMs);
00011     ~TimeoutProg();
00012
00013     void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE Run();
00014
00015 private:
00016     int TimeToTimeOutInMs;
00017 };
00018
00019 TimeoutProg::TimeoutProg(int TimeInMs)
00020 {
00021     if ( TimeInMs <= 0 )
00022     {
00023         TimeToTimeOutInMs = 2*60*1000;  // 1 minutes
00024     }
00025     else
00026     {
00027         TimeToTimeOutInMs = TimeInMs;
00028     }
00029
00030     StartThread();
00031 }
00032
00033 TimeoutProg::~TimeoutProg()
00034 {
00035     StopThread();
00036 }
00037
00038 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE TimeoutProg::Run()
00039 {
00040     int TimeAlreadyWaited = 0;
00041
00042     while( StopPending() == false && TimeAlreadyWaited < TimeToTimeOutInMs )
00043     {
00044         Sleep( 10 );
00045         TimeAlreadyWaited += 10;
00046     }
00047
00048     if ( StopPending() == false )
00049     {
00050         fprintf( stderr, "Timout !!!\n" );
00051         exit(-1);
00052     }
00053 }
00054
00055 // 2 minutes to run
00056 static TimeoutProg TimeoutExecutionOfThisProgram(2*60*1000);
00057
00058 } // namespace Omiscid
